channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring by VMware -- Spring Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring by VMware -- Spring Framework

item.title: CVE-2020-5421|2024-08-04T08:30:23.972Z -- spring%20by%20vmware -- spring%20framework
item.description: In Spring Framework versions 5.2.0 - 5.2.8, 5.1.0 - 5.1.17, 5.0.0 - 5.0.18, 4.3.0 - 4.3.28, and older unsupported versions, the protections against RFD attacks from CVE-2015-5211 may be bypassed depending on the browser used through the use of a jsessionid path parameter.
